thread.section_title: Aberdeen Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Location and Staff
thread.title_full: Nice Location and Staff - Review of Aberdeen Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Mike D
title: Nice Location and Staff
text: The Aberdeen Hotel is right next to the Repubblica Metro Station which made getting around Rome fairly easy. The hotel itself is tucked into an alley and had I not looked at street view on Google maps I might have had trouble finding it. Once in the hotel the staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was sufficient. Good place for budget travel.
